id: Grow OS | Beginner Friendly Notion Template
name: Grow OS | Beginner Friendly Notion Template
description: Grow OS - the only Notion template you need for self-learning.Notion Operating Systems are usually expensive; this one is completely free. More than 100 copies were already downloaded!I created this template a while back to keep track of all my online courses and learning platforms. It proved to be extremely useful in structuring my online learning so I've decided to share it with the world. I hope you'll find it useful!What are you going to get? One place to keep all your resources and web link
features: One place to keep all your resources and web links; Linked databases for all your projects and tasks; A page template that uses The Cornell Note-Taking system; A short how-to that will teach you how to use this template; Fully customizable pages for resources, notes, ideas, projects, and tasks; A progress bar for each project; A few cool third-party integrations - a clock, a life bar, a progress bar for all your projects, and a tracker.
